pr_title: PARQUET-1782: Use Switch Statement in AvroRecordConverter

timeline.message: PARQUET-1782: Use Switch Statement in AvroRecordConverter

timeline.bodyText: Why move this up? I prefer to have it at the previous place.
timeline.author: Fokko

replies.bodyText: With the switch statement, the scope changed and therefore I could not keep it where it was, I had to make it available to a wider scope.  I have made each their own scope now.  Please check the change.  Thanks for the review!
replies.author: belugabehr
